title: The Woman Modi is seen bowing to is the then Mayor of Tumkur, not Gautam Adani's wife
subtitle: The woman whom Narendra Modi was bowing in the picture is Gita Rudresh, then mayor of Tumkur (Karnataka). She is not Gautam Adani's wife.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A photo of Narendra Modi bowing a woman is being shared on Facebook with a claim that the woman in the photo is the wife of Gautam Adani. Let’s try to analyze the extent of the truth in this post. 



When the photo in the post was searched using Google reverse image technique, it was found that the photo was taken when Modi attended the inauguration of ‘India Food Park’ in Tumkur (Karnataka) in 2014. From a newspaper article attached in a tweet, it is learnt that the woman in the photo is Geeta Rudresh, the then Mayor of Tumkur in Karnataka. 



Also, from the details of Modi’s visit published in ‘OneIndia Kannada’ article, it can be seen that Modi reached Tumkur helipad at 9:56 am and was welcomed by Tumkur Mayor, Gita Rudresh.



To sum it up, the woman whom Modi was seen bowing in the photo is not Gautam Adani’s wife; she is Gita Rudresh, the then Mayor of Tumkur.
